title: Development of Instructional Design Strategies to Enhance Remote Mathematics Learning Effectiveness

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary mathematical knowledge and basic digital device operation skills
context.additional_context: Development of effective teaching methodologies and analysis of learning outcomes in smartphone-centric learning environments

learning_goals: Learners can solve at least 80% of math concept application problems in a smartphone-based LMS environment
Learners can establish self-directed learning plans using asynchronous tools such as video lectures, quizzes, and discussion boards
Learners can resolve technical issues in remote learning using a three-tier diagnostic framework (device, network, platform)

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
